articles.description: Australia race to victory on day three of the Fifth Test in Sydney with Scott Boland taking 6-45 to help regain the Border-Gavaskar Trophy.
articles.title: Australia beat India by six wickets to seal 3-1 series win

articles.description: Manchester United's players are sometimes "too anxious, too afraid to play football" on the pitch, says boss Ruben Amorim.
articles.title: Ruben Amorim: Man Utd boss says his players are 'too anxious, too afraid'

articles.description: Lamar Jackson stars as the Baltimore Ravens clinch the AFC North title by beating the Cleveland Browns.
articles.title: Lamar Jackson stars as Baltimore Ravens clinch AFC North crown

articles.description: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta is left bemoaning a penalty decision he calls "bizarre" as his side's Premier League title challenge suffers a setback at Brighton.
articles.title: Arsenal: Mikel Arteta has 'never seen' penalty like Brighton's after Joao Pedro and William Saliba incident

articles.description: Tottenham sign 21-year-old Czech goalkeeper Antonin Kinsky from Slavia Prague in a deal worth about £12.5m.
articles.title: Tottenham transfer news: Antonin Kinsky joins for £12.5m

articles.description: Barcelona midfielder Dani Olmo and forward Pau Victor have been blocked from playing in the rest of the 2024-25 season by Spain's football authorities.
articles.title: Barcelona: Dani Olmo and Pau Victor registration rejected by La Liga

articles.description: A huge NFC showdown in Detroit, Lamar Jackson's final MVP audition and a three-way wildcard battle highlight the final weekend of NFL regular-season games.
articles.title: NFL Week 18 preview: Play-off pemutations, MVP watch, Mahomes and Barkley to miss out

articles.description: World number one Aryna Sabalenka warms up for her Australian Open title defence by winning the Brisbane International.
articles.title: Brisbane International: World number one Aryna Sabalenka claims title

articles.description: Japan's Hideki Matsuyama sets a 54-hole tournament record as he keeps his one-shot lead at the PGA Tour season-opening event in Hawaii.
articles.title: Hideki Matsuyama sets new 54-hole tournament record at The Sentry in Hawaii

articles.description: Has Saturday's 4-1 demolition of West Ham marked the return of the old Manchester City? 'Absolutely not' according to boss Pep Guardiola.
articles.title: Man City 4-1 West Ham: Pep Guardiola says 'old Man City' have definitely not return yet
